description: Qwen3-Max is Alibaba's 1-trillion-parameter mixture-of-experts model, trained on 36T tokens. It accepts extremely long inputs (up to ~262K tokens, expandable toward 1M) and produces up to 65K-token completions. Qwen3-Max achieves near frontier-level performance â€“ in internal tests it trails only Gemini and GPT-5 on certain benchmarks, while surpassing models like Claude and DeepSeek. It is closed-source and offered via Alibaba Cloud, priced at about $1.20 per 1M input tokens and $6.00 per 1M output tokens. Qwen3-Max is adept at broad world knowledge and advanced reasoning. It does not natively handle images or audio (text-only I/O), but it has specialized agentic planning and tool use capabilities. It's the flagship model for enterprise AI in Alibaba's lineup (base and instruct versions available, with a reasoning variant forthcoming).
